Text:
Hi there.
Your video bit rate information is wrong.
The correct is 675 kb/s.
Cumps

"Special edition" means not the real Alien 3.
This version is bullshit :
- Alien is coming from a cow (dog in original)
- The Alien doesn't jump off Ripley at the end.

I hate this special, re-mastered, bullshited edition.
